Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk

Class Preferences

java.lang.Object
co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.Preferences
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributesPreferences, AvailabilityTracker, EventsPreferences, IBeaconsPreferences, LocationPreferences, MessagingPreferences, RegistrationPreferences, SdkPreferences
public class Preferences extends Object
Utility for preferences.

  • Constructor Details

    • Preferences

      public Preferences()

  • Method Details

    • setEncryptionEnabled

      public static void setEncryptionEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Configure encryption usage. Should be called before any preference access.
      Parameters:
      enabled - Whether to use encryption

    • isUsingEncryption

      public static boolean isUsingEncryption()
      Check if encryption is currently being used.
      Returns:
      true if using encrypted preferences

    • isEncryptionDisabledForDevice

      public static boolean isEncryptionDisabledForDevice(android.content.Context context)
      Check if encryption is disabled due to device-specific issues (e.g., Samsung). Useful for logging or debugging in integrations.
      Returns:
      true if encryption is disabled for the current device

    • loadEncryptionPreference

      public static void loadEncryptionPreference(android.content.Context context)
      Get encryption preference from configuration if available. This method should only be called AFTER SharedPreferences is initialized.

    • getInt

      public static int getInt(android.content.Context context, String key, int defValue)
      Get int value from shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      context - Current application context.
      key - Key for value.
      defValue - Default value if not found.
      Returns:
      Int value from shared preferences.

    • setInt

      public static void setInt(android.content.Context context, String key, int value)
      Set int value to shared preferences.
      Parameters:
      context - Current application context.
      key - Key for value.
      value - Int value.

      public static void resetForTesting()

    • clearSharedPreferences

      public static void clearSharedPreferences()
      Clear shared preferences reference to prevent memory leaks. Should be called when the app is being destroyed or when switching contexts.
